page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { }Although{Knighton}is a small town the employment is quite varied.The main employment around the outskirts of the town is Farming.The farmers in this area do not employ many farmhands as their sons join them on the farms after leaving school at the age of sixteen . Some men work with{Powys Highways looking after the roads.Others work in the local factories and the Mill.Many of the women work in the{Trouser Factory,local shops,supermarket and inns.There are also the professional people such as doctors,dentists, teachers,nurses,accountants and solicitors.A number of people travel out of Knighton to work in surrounding factories.Others travel to neighbouring towns to work in Local Government.
